video_prompt: Character's head subtly tilts, hair shifts. Eyes subtly blink. Cybernetic headgear spikily rotate. Robotic arm flexes fingers. Wings gently articulate and shimmer. Iridescent bands subtly catch and reflect surrounding light. Black fabric drapes and settles around her. Halo pulses with soft light.
image_prompt: Full-body 3D cyberpunk angel doll with peach skin, long white hair, and luminous halo, seated on black fabric against a white background. Features include large teal eyes, silver mechanical headgear, bustier, robotic arm, and iridescent silver wings. Highly polished and reflective surfaces, with a blend of angelic and futuristic elements.
refined_video_prompt: Head subtly tilts, hair sways. Eyes softly blink. Spiked cybernetic headgear rotates. Robotic arm's fingers flex. Wings gently articulate, shimmering. Iridescent bands subtly catch and reflect light. Black fabric drapes and settles. Halo softly pulses.
